title: Ticket #7881: Add MIN_FLOCK_LEVEL knob
description:
Add a config knob that allows the admin to specify a set of pools that the schedd should always flock to.

Knob MIN_FLOCK_LEVEL sets a minimum value for each submitter's FlockLevel (how many pools in the FLOCK_TO list should receive a submitter ad). The default is 0.

This can be used as a workaround for situations where the FlockLevel is lowered inappropriately (#7858).
